# flippedVertically

**Type Property**

An option that specifies that images should always be flipped.

## Declaration

```swift
static let flippedVertically: MTKTextureLoader.Origin
```

## Discussion

The texture will be flipped vertically regardless of any metadata in the file indicating the placement of the origin in the source data.

## Specifying Texture Origin Options

- **topLeft**: An option for specifying images that should be flipped only to put their origin in the top-left corner.
- **bottomLeft**: An option for specifying images that should be flipped only to put their origin in the bottom-left corner.
